resources.string: The Palais Garnier which locates in Paris was built from 1861 for the Paris Opera.

This will restart the device the function is associated with !!! \nContinue ?
This will erase all logs, executions and pin states for this function. \nContinue ?
If client this will sync the last execution logs and function state from controller. \nContinue ?

This will start execution of the function 
Keep in mind that starting this function can also start other linked functions 
If client, function state will be updated during execution on controller, this update can take longer than expected 
Execution cannot be stopped once started !!! 
Continue ?
This will erase all logs, executions and pin states for all functions !!! \nContinue ?
If client this will sync all functions execution logs and state from controller. \nThis action can take 1 to 5 minutes to complete depending on connection between client and controller \nContinue ?

This action is supported only on controller !!! 
If client this will have no effect 
 
Enable automatic execution ?

This action is supported only on controller !!! 
If client this will have no effect 
 
Disable automatic execution ?
